----- Original Message -----
From: Daniel Devorkin <devo@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 4:15 PM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] New Merchant - Spoiler


> From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
>
> where did you buy it?
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Fozzle Brainbender <fozzleb@...>
> To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 1:56 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] New Merchant - Spoiler
>
>
> > From: Fozzle Brainbender <fozzleb@...>
> >
> > I was able to buy the sapphire for 107plat today
> >
> >
> > --- HiFi Review <hifireview@...> wrote:
> > > From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
> > >
> > > Before you guys choke on those prices, note that
> > > enchanters with high
> > > charisma and decent faction will get them for MUCH
> > > less.
> > >
> > > --- Charles Adams <sirkal@...> wrote:
> > > > From: Charles Adams <sirkal@...>
> > > >
> > > > Some minor new info for everyone. After the patch
> > > > there is now a Merchant
> > > > that sells Star Rubies, Fire Emeralds, and
> > > Sapphires
> > > > as part of her normal
> > > > items.
> > > >
> > > > It is M. Sparkle. She is located in West
> > > Commonlands
> > > > in the small hut right
> > > > outside Befallen.
> > > >
> > > > Prices are as follows:
> > > >
> > > > Star Rubies - 156 plat
> > > > Fire Emeralds - 204 plat
> > > > Sapphires - 240 plat
> > > >
> > > > Hope this helps someone.
> > > >
> > > > Charles
> > > > Xezol - Lvl 14 Dwarf Paladin on Prexus
> > > > Xezol - Lvl 15 Gnome Mag on E'Ci
> > > >
